SELECT asm.*, attr.id AS attr_id, attr.asm_id AS attr_asm_id, attr.name AS attr_name, attr.label AS attr_label, attr.type AS attr_type, attr.options AS attr_options, attr.value AS attr_value, attr.large_value AS attr_large_value, attr.ordinal AS attr_ordinal, attr.required AS attr_required, core.id AS core_id, core.location AS core_location, core.name AS core_name, core.template_engine AS core_template_engine FROM ASM_PARENTS AS parent INNER JOIN ASMS asm ON asm.id = parent.asm_parent_id LEFT JOIN ASM_ATTRS attr ON attr.asm_id = asm.id LEFT JOIN ASM_CORES core ON core.id = asm.asm_core_id WHERE parent.asm_id = #{id}

mapper.update: MERGE INTO ASM_REFDATA ard USING ( VALUES (#{id}, #{type}, #{svalue}, #{ivalue}) ) AS s(asm_id, type, svalue, ivalue) ON ard.asm_id = s.asm_id AND ard.type = s.type AND ard.svalue = s.svalue AND ard.ivalue = s.ivalue WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (asm_id, type, svalue, ivalue) VALUES (s.asm_id, s.type, s.svalue, s.ivalue) ELSE IGNORE

WITH new_refs (asm_id, type, svalue, ivalue) AS (VALUES (#{id}, #{type}, #{svalue}, #{ivalue})) INSERT INTO ASM_REFDATA (asm_id, type, svalue, ivalue) SELECT asm_id, type, svalue, ivalue FROM new_refs WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ASM_REFDATA ard WHERE ard.asm_id = new_refs.asm_id AND ard.type = new_refs.type AND ard.svalue = new_refs.svalue AND ard.ivalue = new_refs.ivalue )
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "asm_id", ard.svalue AS "svalue" FROM ASM_REFDATA AS ard INNER JOIN ASMS AS a ON ard.asm_id = a.id WHERE ard.type = #{type} AND (YEAR(a.edate) < #{edateLTYear} OR (YEAR(a.edate) = #{edateLTYear} AND DAYOFYEAR(a.edate) <= #{edateLTDay})) AND (YEAR(a.edate) > #{edateGTYear} OR (YEAR(a.edate) = #{edateGTYear} AND DAYOFYEAR(a.edate) >= #{edateGTDay})) ORDER BY a.id

SELECT a.id AS "asm_id", ard.svalue AS "svalue" FROM ASM_REFDATA AS ard INNER JOIN ASMS AS a ON ard.asm_id = a.id WHERE ard.type = #{type} AND (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM a.edate) < #{edateLTYear} OR (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM a.edate) = #{edateLTYear} AND EXTRACT(DOY FROM a.edate) <= #{edateLTDay})) AND (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM a.edate) > #{edateGTYear} OR (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM a.edate) = #{edateGTYear} AND EXTRACT(DOY FROM a.edate) >= #{edateGTDay})) ORDER BY a.id
mapper.update: MERGE INTO ASM_ATTRS a USING ( VALUES (#{asmId}, #{name}, #{label}, #{type}, #{options}, #{required}, #{value}, #{largeValue}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) ) AS s( asm_id, name, label, type, options, required, value, large_value, mdate ) ON a.asm_id = s.asm_id AND a.name = s.name WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET a.label = s.label, a.type = s.type, a.options = s.options, a.required = s.required, a.value = s.value, a.large_value = s.large_value, a.mdate = s.mdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (id, asm_id, name, label, type, options, required, value, large_value, mdate) VALUES (SEQ_ATTR_ID.NEXTVAL, s.asm_id, s.name, s.label, s.type, s.options, s.required, s.value, s.large_value, s.mdate)

INSERT INTO ASM_ATTRS (id, asm_id, name, label, type, options, required, value, large_value, mdate) VALUES (NEXTVAL('SEQ_ATTR_ID'), #{asmId}, #{name}, #{label}, #{type}, #{options}, #{required}, #{value}, #{largeValue}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) ON CONFLICT (asm_id, name) DO UPDATE SET (label, type, options, required, value, large_value, mdate) = (#{label}, #{type}, #{options}, #{required}, #{value}, #{largeValue}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASMS (name, ordinal, asm_core_id, hname, cdate, mdate, muser, owner, published, shadowed, template, template_mode, controller, type, options, description, nav_parent_id, nav_cached_path, lang, edate) SELECT #{name}, SEQ_ASMS_ORDINAL.NEXTVAL, a.asm_core_id, a.hname, #{hname}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, a.muser, a.owner, a.published, a.shadowed, a.template, a.template_mode, a.controller, a.type, #{type}, a.options, a.description, #{description}, a.nav_parent_id, a.nav_cached_path, a.lang, a.edate FROM asms AS a WHERE a.id = #{asmId}

INSERT INTO ASM_PARENTS(asm_id, asm_parent_id) SELECT #{newAsmId}, asm_parent_id FROM asm_parents AS p WHERE p.asm_id = #{asmId} AND p.asm_parent_id != #{newAsmId}
